H0.text: What would you serve in a samovar. Coffee

H1.text: What would you serve in a samovar. Hot Chocolate

H2.text: What would you serve in a samovar. Broth

H3.text: What would you serve in a samovar. Tea

A4.text: Since the heated water is typically used to make tea

A5.text: The tea is served by diluting this concentrate with boiled water from the main container, usually at a water-to-tea ratio of 10 to 1, varying to taste
